programme.desc: LeBron James goes off for a triple-double with 28 points, 14 rebounds and 10 assists to help the Los Angeles Lakers win their 17th championship over the Miami Heat and clinch NBA Finals MVP honors for the fourth time in his legendary career.

programme.title: Hardwood Classics
programme.sub-title: Los Angeles Lakers at Boston Celtics
programme.desc: Game 7 of the 1984 NBA Finals. Behind Cedric Maxwell's 24 points, the Celtics defeat the Lakers for the NBA title.

programme.title: Hardwood Classics
programme.desc: Rolando Blackman sends the game into overtime with two clutch free-throws. Tom Chambers wins the MVP award. From Feb. 8, 1987 in Seattle.

programme.title: Hardwood Classics
programme.desc: Game 7 of the 1987 Eastern Conference Semifinals.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.sub-title: 2024-2025: Washington Wizards at San Antonio Spurs
programme.desc: Victor Wembanyama had a career-high 50 points and the Spurs rolled to a 139-130 victory over the Wizards. Wembanyama was 8-for-16 on 3-pointers, also setting a career high. Jordan Poole had 42 points for Washington. From Nov. 13, 2024.

programme.title: NBA Playoff Playback
programme.sub-title: 2025 Western Conference First Round: Minnesota Timberwolves at Los Angeles Lakers
programme.desc: Rudy Gobert had playoff career highs with 27 points and 24 rebounds, Julius Randle added 23 points and Minnesota advanced in the NBA playoffs with a clinching 103-96 victory in their first-round series.

programme.title: NBA Playoff Playback
programme.sub-title: 2025 Western Conference First Round: Oklahoma City Thunder at Memphis Grizzlies
programme.desc: Chet Holmgren scored all but one of his 24 points in the second half and the Oklahoma City Thunder overcame a 29-point deficit after Ja Morant left the game with a hip injury to beat the Memphis Grizzlies, 114-108, and take a 3-0 series lead.

programme.title: NBA Playoff Playback
programme.sub-title: 2025 Western Conference First Round: Oklahoma City Thunder at Memphis Grizzlies
programme.desc: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 38 points and the Oklahoma City Thunder advanced to the Western Conference semifinals by beating the Memphis Grizzlies, 117-115, to complete a four-game sweep.

programme.title: NBA Playoff Playback
programme.sub-title: 2025 Eastern Conference Semifinals: Indiana Pacers at Cleveland Cavaliers
programme.desc: Game 1. Tyrese Haliburton scored 22 points - including a go-ahead 3-pointer midway through the fourth quarter - had 13 assists and made crucial defensive plays that propelled the Pacers to a 121-112 victory over the top-seeded Cleveland Cavaliers.

programme.title: As We Rise: 25 Years of the WNBA

programme.title: Basketball Stories
programme.desc: George The Iceman Gervin is a pro and college Hall of Famer who was once the most dominant scorer in the NBA. His accolades include four NBA scoring titles, nine All-Star appearances and being honored as one of the top 50 NBA players of all time.

programme.title: NBA Playoff Playback
programme.sub-title: 2019: Los Angeles Clippers at Golden State Warriors
programme.desc: Lou Williams scores 36 points and the Clippers rally from 31 points down on the road to stun the Golden State Warriors 135-131 to even their first-round playoff series at one game apiece.

programme.title: On This Day
programme.sub-title: 2019: Oklahoma City Thunder vs. Portland Trail Blazers
